Created an attachment (id=37989)
patch for org.eclipse.mylar.ide to adapt to latest refactorings in CVS plugin

Thanks Gunnar!  I was very happy to see that patch.

Scheduling this for next week after 0.5.0 goes out and we can move HEAD to the latest.
So 0.5.0 is not going to work with 3.2?

The way we do it is that the 3.2 release supports the latest 3.2 milestone/rc, the 3.1 release supports the latest in the 3.1 stream, and HEAD usually supports the latest integration build.  

So 0.5.0 will support 3.2M6 and 3.1.x.
*** Bug 135536 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Gunnar, please note that we have the convetion of having the person who resolved the bug be the assignee, in order to ensure credit goes where it is due.

Patch applied.  A related patch from bug 136899 resolved the same problem in the corresponding test case.

There is now a dev build that supports 3.2RC1, and there will be an update released to 0.5.0 today for RC1 support.

  download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/dev
